name: Maximum Action
summary: MAXIMUM Action is a brutal and satisfying physics-based first person shooter influenced by Hong Kong cinema, heroic slow motion bloodshed, and old-school FPS ACTION.
info:
• 别名: 终极行动
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月19日 (Early Access)
  • 开发: George Mandell
  • 发行: Balloon Moose Games
